name: Hard-Cooked Egg and Basil-Butter Sandwich
keywords: basil, bread, eggs, main course, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon finely chopped basil (or chives or parsley)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the eggs in a medium pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil, then turn off the heat. Have a bowl of ice water ready. After 9 minutes, transfer the eggs to the ice water to cool completely. Peel and slice.
In a small bowl, stir together the butter, lemon juice and a pinch salt. Stir in the basil and the garlic, if using.

Spread the bread thickly with seasoned butter, all the way to the edges. Lay the egg slices on four of the bread slices and season with salt and pepper. Top with lettuce leaves and the remaining bread.
